changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on three areas: Factor Form migration work (cart-service and calculate endpoints), Good Chop/Pet Food reactivation features (free cuts popup, banners, OTP data), and The Purple Table (TPT) meal selection improvements. Multiple commits involve refactoring, test updates, and bug fixes related to price breakdowns, delivery options, and reactivation flows.

features.name: Preselect chosen recipes in change meals
features.description: Allows users to see their previously selected recipes pre-selected when changing meals

features.name: Reactivation banner entry point
features.description: Adds a banner for reactivation entry point functionality

features.name: Payment page free cuts popup
features.description: Displays popup for free cuts promotion on payment page for Good Chop

features.name: Factor Form OTP frequency selector UI
features.description: User interface for selecting delivery frequency in Factor Form one-time purchase flow

features.name: PetFood PriceBreakDown on Dashboard
features.description: Renders branched out PetFood price breakdown component only on dashboard view

decisions.what: Migrate price item component to Zest design system
Migrate calculate endpoint to calculate prospect batch in VMS
decisions.rationale: Part of Factor Form cart-service migration effort

decisions.what: Update source of customerPlanId for fetchPriceBreakdown logic
decisions.rationale: Correct data source for price breakdown calculations
Consolidate multiple redirection implementations into single logic

refactors.reason: Update test coverage for reactivation flow

fixes.issue: Default cadence params on reactivation not working correctly
Preselect recipes feature reverted and re-implemented

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Undergoing cart-service migration with multiple commits for OTP flow and calculate endpoint changes

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Reactivation flow enhancements including free cuts popup, OTP data attributes, and test updates

entities.name: The Purple Table (TPT)
entities.context: Meal selection improvements, price item migration to Zest, and price breakdown updates

entities.name: PetFood
entities.context: Price breakdown component rendering logic updated for dashboard-specific display

entities.name: cart-service
entities.context: Target of Factor Form migration effort

entities.name: VMS (Vendor Management System)
entities.context: Calculate prospect batch endpoint being integrated

entities.name: Zest
entities.context: Design system being adopted for price item component

key_patterns: Incremental migration pattern: Multiple commits show gradual migration of Factor Form to cart-service
Feature toggle/branching: PetFood price breakdown uses conditional rendering based on context
Revert and re-implement: TPT-2202 was reverted and reimplemented, suggesting iterative refinement
Cross-brand consistency: Similar patterns applied across Good Chop, Factor Form, and TPT (reactivation flows, price breakdowns)
Test-driven changes: Multiple commits include test updates alongside feature changes
GTM/Analytics integration: OTP data attributes added for tracking user behavior
Payload enrichment: Additional data added to delivery option updates for better tracking/functionality
